LanguageData.FFF.DeactivateMechDesc: Put this mech into hibernation mode. It will become a dormant structure that can be reactivated later by a mechanitor.
LanguageData.FFF.MechActivated: {0} has been activated and is now under {1}'s control.
LanguageData.FFF.NeedMoreBandwidth: Need {0} bandwidth to control this mech.
LanguageData.FFF.HackFailedDesc: {0} failed to hack the mech. The mech has awakened and is now hostile!
